#summary Details for adding this framework as a Maven dependency

=Latest Release=
=== pom.xml ===
NOTE: We're currently (as of Feb 25, 2011) getting this set up and verified. In the mean time, use the snapshot build below.
{{{
<repository>
	<id>sonatype-oss-repo</id>
	<name>Sonatype Open Source maven staging repo</name>
	<url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/staging/</url>
</repository>

<!-- This for the whole DAO -->
<dependency>
	<groupId>com.googlecode.genericdao</groupId>
	<artifactId>dao-hibernate</artifactId>
	<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>

<!-- Or this for just the search -->
<dependency>
	<groupId>com.googlecode.genericdao</groupId>
	<artifactId>search-hibernate</artifactId>
	<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

=Latest Snapshot Build=
This includes the latest bug fixes and enhancements and passes all tests.
===pom.xml===
{{{
<repository>
	<id>sonatype-oss-repo</id>
	<name>Sonatype Open Source maven snapshot repo</name>
	<url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/</url>
</repository>

<!-- This for just the whole DAO -->
<dependency>
	<groupId>com.googlecode.genericdao</groupId>
	<artifactId>dao-hibernate</artifactId>
	<version>1.1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

<!-- Or this for just the search -->
<dependency>
	<groupId>com.googlecode.genericdao</groupId>
	<artifactId>search-hibernate</artifactId>
	<version>1.1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>
}}}
